meta.title: From SHEPHERD to PIE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: August is the "dog days" of summer, so we're featuring Raddles built around phrases that have a dog breed in them. The German Shepherd is a large, smart breed, known for its loyalty and skills at scaring off intruders, from humans to rabbits. What a smart doggie.

ladder.clue: Change a letter in ^ to get a kind of car
^ & ___, a place to ^, then ___ (in some parts of the US)
Four-wheeled device that's useful when you ^
Add a letter to ^ to get a graph
